description: This file is a React Native component implementing a Tic-Tac-Toe game UI with game logic, styling, and interactivity.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main React component managing the Tic-Tac-Toe game state and rendering the UI.

methods.name: handleLayout
methods.description: Handles layout changes to dynamically set grid size based on available width.

methods.name: checkWinner
methods.description: Checks the current board for a winner and returns the winner and winning line.

methods.name: handlePressCell
methods.description: Handles user pressing a cell, updates game state, and determines game outcome.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game state to start a new game.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders an individual cell of the Tic-Tac-Toe grid.
